column1: Table 2. Prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction by region and jurisdiction, December 31, 2007, and averages of the preceding 6 years
Authors: Heather C. West and William J. Sabol, Ph.D.
Table 2. Prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction by region and jurisdiction, December 31, 2007, and averages of the preceding 6 years
~Not applicable. As of December 31, 2001, sentenced felons from the District of Columbia were the responsibility of the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
a/Prisons and jails form one integrated system. Data include total jail and prison populations.
b/Estimates only. Data for 2007 were not available at time of publication.
